alternative_names.name: Nagagutsu o Haita Neko: Sekai Isshuu 80 Nichi Daibouken
Nagagutsu o Haita Neko: Sekai Isshuu 80 Nichi Daibouken

name: Puss 'n Boots: Pero's Great Adventure
summary: Pero is Puss N' Boots of storybook fame and he's caught up in a whirlwind adventure, traveling through time and around the world! True-blue Pero has been "cat-apulted" back through time by the terrible Count Gruemon. Now Pero must cross many dangerous lands to defeat Count Gruemon and recover the Time Machine which will return Pero home. It's a "cat-astrophe!"
